import React, { useEffect } from "react"; function Cart({ cartProduct, updateQuantity, handleDelete }) { const [totalPrice, setTotalPrice] = useState() useEffect(() => { let totalPrice = cartProduct.reduce(function (price, product) { return price + product.quantity * product.price; }, 0); }, [cartProduct]); return (

); } export default Cart;
